website_summaries.verdict: Aluminum-clad and ready for all day off the plug, the Acer Chromebook 514 is a reasonably-priced standout on the premium Chromebook stage that's right-priced for students and budget buyers.
pros: Sharp-looking aluminum design for a budget machine

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard not backlit
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good computer however it does not have a backlit keyboard as stated in the description. Unfortunately I had to return it for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: #Selfie

customer_reviews.title: Acer Chromebook 14 CB514-1H
customer_reviews.text: A useful workhorse for doing emails and surfing. The 14 inch screen is more than adequate for this. I'm not sure about the metal casing, I prefer plastic. The touch screen version would've been useful, but the expense was not justified. Battery life is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian36

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a budget laptop. Mine did NOT come with a backlit keyboard :(
customer_reviews.text: The screen is a tiny little bit dim from the anti glare thing. I keep pressing the search button when typing but that's something i'll get used to I think. Overall the Chromebook is very good for the money I spent. Just a disappointment that there is no backlit keyboard. The keyboard has been put down on some reviews on youtube but I quite like it. The keys press really nicely. The mouse pad is really nice too. Its so easy to use and this is my first chromebook. So far I'm very please with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mahala debnam

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my deceased MacBook Pro. This cost a fifth of the price and is great. I store all my files on the Google Drive anyway, so this was an easy switch to make. Great battery life and brilliant screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Browne

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this unit despite no backlit keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this , purchased as an alternative to my tablet and I'm not disappointed,it's fast and quality build .my only moan is in lots of descriptions on other sites it states this has a backlit keyboard one reason for the purchase but it doesn't have it ,and only seems to connect to a Google phone ,can't get it to connect to a Huawei or a Samsung. connection to bluetooth head phone is simple and quick .
customer_reviews.author: george highton

customer_reviews.title: Give it a miss
customer_reviews.text: The display on this is truly horrible. Flushed out and dreary. Build quality is fine, but for £295 this a incredibly overpriced and extremely poor value for money. The wifi was also poor, inferior to a cheaper 5 year old chromebook we have in the house. I cannot in good faith reccomend this to anyone and it is being returned straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barnes

customer_reviews.title: No Back Light
customer_reviews.text: They have changed it now but no back light on this is an issue so returned
customer_reviews.author: N. Steggel

customer_reviews.title: Just wanting working. My problem
customer_reviews.text: Me being thick. Carnt connect to the internet. Age 61. Sure it's good lol
customer_reviews.author: Tony bent

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly groovy very light to carry laptop.
customer_reviews.text: For God's sake this is absolutely AMAZING!!!!! LUV it to the max!!! Its Groovy!!!! I'm a happy bunny . Thank you Seller. And your courier today was lovely too!!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rozss Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Good little performer
customer_reviews.text: Very quick and versatile. Integrated well into my work and personal life. Screen can be a bit 'blunt' but value for money
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Spangle

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebook 14 CB514-1H - (Intel Celeron N3350, 4GB RAM, 32GB eMMC, 14 inch HD display, Chrome OS, Silver)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Silver| Style Name:HD, 32GBAcer Chromebook 14 CB514-1H - (Intel Celeron N3350 processor, 4GB RAM, 32GB eMMC, 14 inch HD display, Chrome OS, Silver)
feature_bullets: Strength, durability and stylish good looks are provided through the aluminium chassis. The strong lightweight metal chassis means that it is less likely to be bent, warped or dented than other materials.
Fast boot times, ease of use, tough security and a long battery life are some of the advantages of Chrome OS.
Up to 12 hours of battery life goes a long way. With just a single charge, get in a full day’s work, study or play with time to spare.
Traditional office productivity programs like Microsoft Office and Skype have Chrome versions, as too do Facebook and Instagram.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
